named-native-query.name: Factura.getPdfFacturaUsuario
named-native-query.query: SELECT f.fecha as fecha, us.identificacion as identificacion, us.nombres as nombres, us.celular as celular, us.email as email, f.id_factura as id_factura, cl.id_cliente as id_cliente,p.precio_producto as precio_producto, p.nombre_producto as nombre_producto, us.direccion as direccion,cf.cantidad as cantidad, cf.descuento as descuento, cf.iva as iva, cf.subtotal as subtotal, cf.total as total FROM usuario us JOIN cliente cl ON us.id = cl.id_persona JOIN factura f ON f.id_cliente = cl.id_cliente JOIN cuerpo_factura cf ON f.id_factura = cf.id_factura JOIN productos p ON cf.id_producto = p.id_producto WHERE f.id_factura = :idFactura
